message: The navButtonText property is deprecated since version 1.20. Deprecated since the MVI theme is removed now. This property only affected the NavButton in that theme.
The orientationChange event is deprecated since version 1.20.0. use sap.ui.Device.orientation.attachHandler(...)
The leftButton association is deprecated since version 1.15.1. This property has been deprecated since 1.15.1. Please use the beginButton instead.
